brainly_data.question: Which statements best describe how businesses can take advantage of globalization? Check all that apply. using lower labor costs in other countries creating higher barriers to trade transporting resources quickly from distant locations limiting trade with other countries communicating more quickly with other countries
brainly_data.subject: Social studies

Check all that apply. using lower labor costs in other countries creating higher barriers to trade transporting resources quickly from distant locations limiting trade with other countries communicating more quickly with other countries
all_answers.subject: Social studies

using lower labor costs in other countries
transporting resources quickly from distant locations
communicating more quickly with other countries
